ai_operations.reasoning: Focused on splitting clusters by project phases (planning, execution, approval), distinct sub-topics (e.g., social media vs market research in UrbanEdge), and temporal sequences (e.g., draft vs finalization in Q3 Content Calendar). Large clusters (>20 messages) were split into 2-3 sub-clusters to ensure granularity. No merges were identified as each cluster and sub-cluster represents unique topics or phases. Total new clusters created: 18, meeting the target of 15-20 final clusters.
